vote.title: Authorize (1) the City Manager to amend Resolution No. 18-1158, previously approved on August 22, 2018 to include approval of the FOUR-TRACK STRATEGY proposed by Office of Homeless Solutions, implement track one (Increase Shelter Capacity - expand capacity of existing providers through contracted pay to stay shelter beds); and (2) adopt or approve the proposed updates as presented to the Housing & Homelessness Solutions Committee on September 29, 2022 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize (1) the City Manager to amend Resolution No. 18-1158, previously approved on August 22, 2018 to include approval of the FOUR-TRACK STRATEGY proposed by Office of Homeless Solutions, implement track one (Increase Shelter Capacity - expand capacity of existing providers through contracted pay to stay shelter beds); and (2) adopt or approve the proposed updates as presented to the Housing & Homelessness Solutions Committee on September 29, 2022 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
